alert.note: Alert for Mahnomen (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:51PM CDT until May 30 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR EASTERN MAHNOMEN AND SOUTHERN CLEARWATER COUNTIES... At 550 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ebro to near Naytahwaush, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bagley, Island Lake in Mahnomen County, Naytahwaush, Rice Lake, Roy Lake, northern Long Lost Lake and Pine Bend. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
